text:
I won’t like to visit this guardian anymore cos MS LINDA WHO IS one salesgal this morning , wf sucha a sulking face n foul mood .
Jus reminded her that if u wanna be in servicing line, pls serve pp wf a smile esp this is an old estate
We senior citizens need frdly n helpful staffs in here.
Today 15/6/2024 9.14 am

Small and convenient Guardian store in the neighbourhood. There are many good deals for discount items being displayed in front of the shop. Staff are friendly and helpful, always help me to find the items I need.
It is ridiculous for charging $0.10 for a small bag for one item purchased over $35. Is Guardian profiteering in the name of recycling? Will never buy from Guardian again.
Do not follow instructions as per law and refuse cash withdrawal
Convenient place. Else have to travel to Parkway Parade. Place maybe small. But have the essentials you need.
